Row.Text: A heroic poem honouring our good and noble campaigns has been delivered to our court. The author is unknown, but their intent is clear; to venerate and honour their great lord Charlemagne. This is a masterpiece that shall truly last the ages.[NEWLINE]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital receives a free Great Work of Writing[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Military Land Units gain 5 XP[ENDCOLOR]
An epic poem has been compiled in our honour.

Our on-going war has spurred the innovations of our military genuises and they have conceived of a way to increase the efficacy of our siege weapons. With the right funding and proper implementation, no city will stand in the way of our war machines.[NEWLINE]
These new stratagems must be applied at once!
